L. Bajaj</EM></H2> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <P> C. L. Bajaj, V. Anupam, F. Bernardini, S. Cutchin, J. Chen, S. Evans, D. Schikore, G. Xu, and P. Zhang. Scientific Problem Solving in a Distributed and Collaborative Environment. In Mathematics and Computers in Simulation, Volume 36, pages 433-542. North Holland, 1994.<P> C. L. Bajaj and F. Bernardini. Distributed and Collaborative Synthetic Environments. In Human-Computer Interaction and Virtual Environments. NASA Conference Publication, Hampton, VA, April 1995.<P> C. L. Bajaj, F. Bernardini, and G. Xu. Adaptive Reconstruction of Surfaces and Scalar Fields From Scattered Trivariate Data. In Proceedings of the Fourth SIAM Conference on Geometric Design, Nashville, TN, November 1995.<P> C. L. Bajaj, F. Bernardini, and G. Xu. Automatic Reconstruction of Surfaces and Scalar Fields from 3D Scans. In Proceedings of SIGGRAPH 95, pages 109-118, 1995.<P> C. L. Bajaj, J. Chen, and G. Xu. Free-Form Surface Design With A-Patches. In Proceedings of Graphics Interface '94, pages 174-191, Vancouver, Canada, 1994. Canadian Information Processing Society.<P> C. L. Bajaj, J. Chen, and G. Xu. Modeling with C2 Quintic A-Patches. In Fourth SIAM Conference on Geometric Design, Nashville, TN, November 1995.<P> C. L. Bajaj, J. Chen, and G. Xu. Modeling with Cubic A-Patches. ACM Transactions on Graphics, 14(2):103-133, April 1995.<P> C. L. Bajaj, E. Coyle, and K. Lin. Arbitrary Topology Shape Reconstruction from Planar Cross Sections. In Fourth SIAM Conference on Geometric Design, Nashville, TN, November 1995.<P> C. L. Bajaj and D. Schikore. Custom Prosthesis Design, Visualization, and Prototyping. In Proceedings of Visualization in Biomedical Computing, Volume VBC94, 1994.<P> C. L. Bajaj, D. Schikore, and G. Xu. Distributed Volume Modelling and Collaborative Visualization. In Proceedings of the Fifth Eurographics Workshop on Visualization in Scientific Computing, Rostock, Germany, 1994.<P> C. L. Bajaj and G. Xu. Nurbs Approximation of Surface/Surface Intersection Curves. Advances in Computational Mathematics, 2(1):1-21, 1994.<P> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <ADDRESS>CS Annual Report - 19 APR 1996</ADDRESS> <A HREF="AR95Book-144.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bnext.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-142.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bprev.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-139.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bup.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Btop.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bcontent.gif"></A><BR><A HREF="AR95Book-144.html">[Next] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-142.html">[Previous] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-139.html">[Up] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html">[Top] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html">[Contents]</A> <P> </BODY> </HTML> </HTML>
